Senior Backend Engineer

Engineering Systems That Drive Business Performance

With 5+ years designing and building enterprise-grade backend systems, I architect solutions that eliminate operational bottlenecks, automate high-volume workflows, and deliver measurable business outcomes — from API platforms processing millions of records to ERP extensions that transform organisational efficiency.

Middleware & API Architecture

Clean, contract-driven APIs that integrate enterprise systems with precision and reliability.

High-Throughput Data Systems

ETL pipelines and data architectures capable of processing millions of records with optimised performance.

Performance Engineering

Systematic bottleneck identification and architectural optimisation to reduce latency and operational cost.

Internal Business Platforms

Bespoke operational tools that improve turnaround time, reporting accuracy, and team efficiency.

Featured Systems

Architected Solutions

Internal Platform

Toolkit — Internal Operations Platform

Problem

Fragmented internal workflows causing project cost overruns, delayed reporting, and opaque resource allocation.

Approach

Designed a unified operations platform with project tracking, financial reporting, and resource management modules backed by a clean REST API layer.

Result

65% cost reduction; leadership gained real-time visibility into project health and spend.

ASP.NET APILaravelVue.jsMS SQL
SLA Tracking

E-Presence Queue & SLA Tracking

Problem

No visibility into service queues led to SLA breaches, slow escalations, and customer dissatisfaction.

Approach

Built a real-time queue management and SLA monitoring system with automated escalation and breach alerting.

Result

60% faster mean time to resolution across all monitored SLA workflows.

ASP.NET APILaravelMS SQLRedisVue.Js
Data Engineering

High-Throughput Data Pipeline

Problem

Batch data processes taking hours, causing downstream delays and stale reporting for business decisions.

Approach

Architected an incremental ETL pipeline with parallel processing, cursor-based pagination, and optimised bulk inserts.

Result

Millions of records processed in minutes; near-real-time data availability for analytics.

C# .NETSQL ClientCSVHelperMSSQLSQLBULKCopy
Recommendation Engine

Gorse Recommendation Engine

Problem

Generic content delivery reducing user engagement and platform retention.

Approach

Integrated Gorse open-source recommendation engine with a custom ingestion pipeline and feedback loop feeding user interaction signals.

Result

Personalised content delivery at scale with measurable uplift in engagement metrics.

LaravelGorseRedisDockerNginxAlpine.Js
Middleware

Middleware & Document Generation APIs

Problem

Siloed enterprise systems with inconsistent data formats and no unified document generation layer.

Approach

Designed a middleware orchestration layer normalising inter-system communication, plus a document generation API handling templated PDF/report output.

Result

Eliminated integration friction; consistent, auditable document output organisation-wide.

ASP.NET APIRESTMSSQLSwagger.NET Playwright
Project Governance

Demand Portal — Project Prioritisation & Governance

Problem

Project requests flowed through fragmented channels with no consistent evaluation criteria — causing resource conflicts, escalating costs, and decisions disconnected from business value.

Approach

Designed a centralised intake and governance platform with structured scoring (impact, risk, cost, alignment), automated ranking, transparent approval pipelines, and executive dashboards.

Result

65% reduction in project costs — IT repositioned as a strategic partner, not a reactive service unit.

LaravelVue.jsMsSQL

Engineering Approach

How I Think & Build

"I don't just write code — I analyse systems, identify constraints, and architect solutions that scale."

Bottleneck Analysis First

Before writing a single line, I identify where the real performance, cost, or reliability constraints live in a system.

Architecture Before Implementation

I design for maintainability, extensibility, and observability — not just the immediate requirement.

Impact Is the Metric

Every technical decision maps back to a business outcome: speed, cost, reliability, or scale.

Optimise for the Long Game

Systems I build are designed to survive team changes, scope growth, and operational pressure over time.
